annotations.description: The performance from both sides could be described as average. There were only a few stirring moments and the fans probably expected more from this game. The home side dominated today's game. Both the home and the away side were creating their opportunities using lightning fast counter attacks.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee blows his whistle for the final time to end this match.
Flag goes up against Hulk (Zenit Petersburg) and the referee blows his whistle for offside. The referee blows his whistle for offside.

Great solo effort by Axel Witsel (Zenit Petersburg) as he beats two defenders before unleashing a low drive from just outside of the box towards the middle of the goal. The goalkeeper is ready and makes a decent save.
Zenit Petersburg are playing some nice combination football, sending it precisely from player to player, but a defender shows good anticipation and ends the move with a good block.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: Fourth official shows 2 min. of added time.

That didn't go as planned! Axel Witsel (Zenit Petersburg) tried his luck from the edge of the box, but his effort low towards the middle of the goal was too weak to get past Jaume Domenech, who easily kept it out.
Axel Witsel (Zenit Petersburg) missed a great opportunity! He jumped for a cross and headed towards goal from the penalty spot, but the ball sailed well wide of the left post!
Hulk (Zenit Petersburg) quickly takes the free kick with a short pass.
Andre Gomes (Valencia) brings his opponent down with a tackle and Svein Moen blows his whistle for a foul.

What a great touch by Aleksander Ryazantsev (Zenit Petersburg) as he controls a fine pass into the box and takes a shot to the centre of the goal, but an opposing player makes a clearance. Great defending.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Luis Andre Pina Cabral Villas Boas prepares a substitution. Neto is replaced by Aleksey Evseev (Zenit Petersburg).
Valencia are ruled offside.
Jaume Domenech blocks Aleksander Ryazantsev (Zenit Petersburg)'s effort from the edge of the box.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Aleksander Ryazantsev (Zenit Petersburg) replaces Oleg Shatov.
Zenit Petersburg seem to be finding their feet as they enjoy some possession. They are waiting for the right moment to create new attacking opportunities.
Hulk (Zenit Petersburg) takes the free kick from the edge of the box. His decent attempt goes narrowly wide of the left post.
Zenit Petersburg are awarded a free kick from a dangerous position.

annotations.label: r-card
annotations.description: Ruben Vezo (Valencia) receives a red card after his awful challenge. He completely lost his temper and referee Svein Moen sends him off the pitch.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The substitution has been made. Rodrigo De Paul (Valencia) has replaced Joao Cancelo.
Danny (Zenit Petersburg) stands over the free kick and opts to take it himself, sending the ball towards the bottom left corner only for Jaume Domenech to dive and make a save.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Svein Moen shows a yellow card to Axel Witsel (Zenit Petersburg) for a tough tackle.
Neto (Zenit Petersburg) has picked up a minor injury, but it looks like he will be able to continue.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Neto (Zenit Petersburg) requires medical treatment, so the referee stops play and signals for the physio to come onto the pitch.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Andre Gomes (Valencia) takes the corner but only sends it into a huddle of the defenders and one of them makes a good clearance.
A cross into the box from Andre Gomes (Valencia) is cleared. Now Valencia have a corner.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Danny puts the ball across the area and Artem Dzyuba (Zenit Petersburg) has the easiest task in the world to tuck the ball into an empty net. 2:0.
A lofted cross from Daniel Parejo (Valencia) is unsuccessful as the opponent's defence quickly clears the ball out of the penalty area.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: It's time for a substitution. Danilo (Valencia) comes on in place of Enzo Perez.

Sofiane Feghouli (Valencia) reacts well and displays good awareness near the penalty spot to get on the end of a cross from the free kick. He jumps high and produces a header which goes well wide of the right post.
Valencia will take a free kick.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: The referee gives a yellow card to Artur Yusupov (Zenit Petersburg).
A pass from Domenico Criscito (Zenit Petersburg) is intercepted by Jaume Domenech and the move breaks down.
Gooal! No wait, it's been ruled out for offside. Aymen Abdennour (Valencia) disagrees, but the linesman is sure about his call.
Flag up against Artem Dzyuba (Zenit Petersburg). He had space to move into behind the defence, but he went too soon.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Here is a change. Igor Smolnikov is going off and Luis Andre Pina Cabral Villas Boas gives the last tactical orders to Artur Yusupov (Zenit Petersburg).
Svein Moen blows his whistle after Nicolas Lombaerts (Zenit Petersburg) kicks an opponent's legs instead of the ball.
Andre Gomes (Valencia) attempts to slip the ball through the defence, but is unable to find any of his teammates. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Zenit Petersburg.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Santi Mina (Valencia) rolls the ball short to a teammate from the corner instead of sending a cross into the box.

Sofiane Feghouli (Valencia) attempts to set up his teammate with a scoring opportunity by chipping in a fine pass from the edge of the box, but one of the defenders intercepts his effort. The referee blows his whistle, Valencia are awarded a corner kick.

What an opportunity! Ezequiel Garay (Zenit Petersburg) leaps high to meet a beautiful cross into the box from the free kick, and he plants a header from near the penalty spot which goes a whisker wide of the left post.
Svein Moen blows for a foul after Sofiane Feghouli (Valencia) was too aggressive in the battle for the ball. That's a free kick to Zenit Petersburg.
Axel Witsel (Zenit Petersburg) makes a reckless foul in order to win the ball from his opponent. Svein Moen has a clear sight of it and blows his whistle.
The free kick is delivered by Hulk (Zenit Petersburg) but it's not one of his best and is easily cleared.
Referee Svein Moen sees the trip by Joao Cancelo (Valencia) and doesn't hesitate to blow his whistle. Zenit Petersburg win a free kick and will be able to apply some pressure on the opposition goal.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Santi Mina (Valencia) has come on for Rafael Mir Vicente.
The linesman raises his flag. Sofiane Feghouli (Valencia) is adjudged offside.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Hulk (Zenit Petersburg) takes a short corner kick.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Hulk (Zenit Petersburg) takes the corner but it's cleared. It will be a corner kick for Zenit Petersburg.
One of the defenders reacts at the last minute to brilliantly block a pass from Oleg Shatov (Zenit Petersburg). The ball is out of play. Zenit Petersburg win a corner kick.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Hulk (Zenit Petersburg) decides to take a short corner instead of crossing into the box.
The ball is cleared after Hulk (Zenit Petersburg) attempted to dribble past an opposing player. The referee points to the corner flag and Zenit Petersburg will take a corner.
Rafael Mir Vicente (Valencia) sends a long ball in, but Yuri Lodygin comfortably gathers the ball.
Joao Cancelo (Valencia) swings a cross into the box, but it's far too close to Yuri Lodygin, who smothers the ball.
Valencia control the tempo of the game by exchanging some accurate short passes.
The linesman signals that Domenico Criscito (Zenit Petersburg) is offside and the referee confirms the decision.
Jose Gaya (Valencia) attempts to find the head of one of his teammates with a promising cross into the box, but a defender outjumps the attackers and averts the threat.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Daniel Parejo (Valencia) takes the corner which is cleared by the opposition's defence.
Alcacer Paco (Valencia) slaloms his way past challenges, but an opposing player does well to get the ball away. The referee signals a corner kick to Valencia.

What a poor attempt! Hulk (Zenit Petersburg) drives another shot towards goal this time from further out, but it couldn't have been worse if he had shot blindfolded. The ball goes yards wide of the left post.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Everything is set for the start of the second half.

Well, a decent first half here. It's certainly not boring, but not the best match either. Neither team was able to take the initiative and dominate the first half. Both the home and the away side are creating their opportunities using lightning fast counter attacks.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The end of the first half.
What a miskick by Danny (Zenit Petersburg). He smashes a volley from long distance that goes into the stands.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: 2 min. of stoppage time to be played.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Rafael Mir Vicente (Valencia) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Svein Moen didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Daniel Parejo swings in a cross from the corner, but Yuri Lodygin (Zenit Petersburg) reads it well and gathers the ball.
Daniel Parejo (Valencia) passes the ball onto Alcacer Paco, but one of the defenders dispossesses him. The ball is out of play and the linesman points at the corner flag. Corner to Valencia.
A precise cross towards the penalty spot was latched onto by Alcacer Paco (Valencia). He outjumped the defence and produced a decent header which went a whisker wide of the left post.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Neto (Zenit Petersburg) is clearly asking for some medical attention with his painful gestures. The extent of his injury is yet to be discovered.
Zenit Petersburg play a few nice passes from player to player, but their possession doesn't last long as an opposition player intercepts a pass.
A pass from Joao Cancelo (Valencia) is intercepted by Yuri Lodygin and the move breaks down.
Oleg Shatov (Zenit Petersburg) seems to be alright and is okay to carry on.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: The game is interrupted now, Oleg Shatov (Zenit Petersburg) picks up a knock and the physio has to come on.
Artem Dzyuba received a sweet pass from Danny (Zenit Petersburg), but the advance is stopped.
Hulk (Zenit Petersburg) swings in a promising cross from the free kick, but one of the defenders does a perfect job to avert the danger.
Svein Moen couldn't ignore the rough tackle by Joao Cancelo (Valencia) and blew his whistle. Zenit Petersburg are given an advantage. They have a free kick.
Danny (Zenit Petersburg) is flagged for offside.
Hulk (Zenit Petersburg) takes the ball and sets it for the free kick.
Hulk (Zenit Petersburg) produces a lovely chip pass into the box, but one of the opposition players cuts it out.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The corner from Daniel Parejo (Valencia) is intercepted by the defence.

Rafael Mir Vicente (Valencia) finds himself free inside the box and pulls the trigger, but his effort is brilliantly stopped by one of the defending players. Good work from Valencia as they win a corner.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Daniel Parejo (Valencia) steps up to take the corner. He launches the ball into the penalty area, but it only finds the head of an opposing player who clears the danger.

Daniel Parejo (Valencia) attempts to find his teammate with a pass from outside the box, but the opposition's defence is quick to react and thwarts the attack. The referee and one of his assistants signal for a corner kick to Valencia.
Rafael Mir Vicente (Valencia) slams the ball towards the middle of the goal, but it fails to surprise Yuri Lodygin and he's equal to it.
Hulk (Zenit Petersburg) floats the free kick into the box, but it's easily cleared by the first man.
Svein Moen blows the whistle, Enzo Perez (Valencia) is penalised for a foul. Zenit Petersburg are awarded the free kick.
Andre Gomes (Valencia) sends over a cross, but he can't find any teammate inside the box. Poor delivery. The ball goes out of play and Zenit Petersburg will have a goal kick.
The players claim that Artem Dzyuba (Zenit Petersburg) handled the ball and it seems they are right.
Danny (Zenit Petersburg) attempts to surprise the keeper with a shot from distance, but it lacks accuracy and goes high over the crossbar.
Zenit Petersburg quickly take the free kick with a short pass.
The referee blows his whistle after Daniel Parejo (Valencia) does a good impression of a basketball player and handles the ball.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Hulk (Zenit Petersburg) steps up to take the corner, but the ball just sails in among the defenders.

The game is interrupted as Alcacer Paco (Valencia) is flagged offside.
Hulk (Zenit Petersburg) is caught offside!
Andre Gomes (Valencia) was trying to get to the ball but clattered into the legs of the opponent as well. Svein Moen blows his whistle for an infringement.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Domenico Criscito (Zenit Petersburg) is awarded a yellow card for his tackle. He doesn't seem to agree with the decision, but Svein Moen ignores the protests.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Artem Dzyuba provides Oleg Shatov (Zenit Petersburg) with a nice pass inside the box. It allows him to finish with a strike into the middle of the goal. 1:0.
Hulk (Zenit Petersburg) is adjudged to have been offside when making his run.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Hulk (Zenit Petersburg) swings in the corner, but it's comfortably cleared away.
Domenico Criscito (Zenit Petersburg) tries to slide the ball through to a teammate but it's well blocked by a defender. The ball goes out of play. Zenit Petersburg are awarded a corner kick.

Valencia decide to take a short pass from the free kick and the attacking effort continues.

Sofiane Feghouli (Valencia) plays in a hopeful cross, but it doesn't find its way to any of the attacking players.
Hulk (Zenit Petersburg) looks to break free, but an opposing player clears the ball away. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Valencia.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Hulk (Zenit Petersburg) sends in the corner, but fails to find the head of any of his teammates, allowing the defence to clear.

annotations.description: The match has just started.

annotations.label: lineup1
annotations.description: Before the start of the game, you can see the starting lineups for today's clash.
Good afternoon, ladies and gentleman! Welcome to our live text commentary, where we will provide you with instant updates of everything that happens in the match.

The performance from both sides could be described as average. There were only a few stirring moments and the fans probably expected more from this game. The home side dominated today's game. Both the home and the away side were creating their opportunities using lightning fast counter attacks.
